mapper.select: select t1.row_id id, date_format(t1.created,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') created, T1.NAME areaName FROM CX_O_AREA t1 where 1=1 and t1.TYPE = 'Province' and not exists (select s1.area_id from LNK_INTER_FREIGHT_NAREA s1 where t1.row_id = s1.area_id and s1.freight_id = #{mvgParentId}) and not exists (select s1.area_id from LNK_INTER_FREIGHT_YAREA s1 where t1.row_id = s1.area_id and s1.freight_id = #{mvgParentId})

select t1.row_id id, date_format(t1.created,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') created, (case when t2.commodity_scope_id = t3.row_id then 'Y' else 'N' end) isDefault, T3.NAME areaName from LNK_INTER_FREIGHT_NAREA t1 left join LNK_FREIGHT t2 on t1.freight_id = t2.row_id left join CX_O_AREA t3 on t1.area_id = t3.row_id where 1=1 and t3.TYPE = 'Province' and t1.freight_id = #{mvgParentId}
mapper.insert: insert into LNK_INTER_FREIGHT_NAREA (row_id, freight_id, area_id) values (#{id}, #{mvgParentId}, #{mvgSubsetId})
